Welcome to OSS_DBS’s documentation!¶

Here we’ll start the documentation!

Note

This is just a frist draft of documentation.

Overview¶

Gerneral Overview about the software OSS-DBS and the us use cases. Also links to important publications. Test paper [Butenko2019] from xy.

[Butenko2019]
  1. Butenko et al., OSS-DBS

Installation¶

You can install OSS-DBS unsing pip

$ pip install oss_dbs
